body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! My name is Andrew Cooper, and I represent Luminous Lens Photography Studio. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Jane Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: How can I assist you today, Jane?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling quite disappointed with the pricing on my recent quote. It seems much higher than what I was expecting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Jane. To better assist you, may I have your email address to look up your quote and see what might have caused the confusion?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. And for verification purposes, can I also have your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's April twelfth, one nine nine two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. I see the problem now. It appears there was a system error that incorrectly calculated your quote. I'll rectify this right away and send you an updated quote. Is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for looking into it so quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jane! You should receive the updated quote shortly. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for your time today. Have a great day ahead!
